Source.Name: minidlna
Source.Summary: ReadyMedia (previously MiniDLNA) is server software that serves media files (music, pictures, and video) to clients on a network.
Source.Description: ReadyMedia (previously MiniDLNA) is server software with the aim of being fully compliant with DLNA/UPnP clients. The MiniDNLA daemon serves media files (music, pictures, and video) to clients on a network. Example clients include applications such as totem and xbmc, and devices such as portable media players, Smartphones, Televisions, and gaming systems (such as PS3 and Xbox 360).
